content: Hi - i am looking at http://build.fhir.org/structuredefinition.profile.xml.html and can't see where the element useContext gets marked as trial use in the current build -am I missing something as it is marked TU on the rendered structure view?
I think that's driven by an extension, not useContext
contextUse is an example of an element marked as TU I can't see the extension that is setting that status...
